Home.title: Build your
Home.description: Symply offers you the ultimate simplicity to create unique servers. Unleash your creativity without constraints and build unforgettable game worlds in the blink of an eye.

modal.title: Download
modal.description:
You are about to download Symply, our beta application designed to simplify the creation of Minecraft Bedrock servers.

As a development team, we encourage you to use Symply with caution and understand that errors may occur.

For more information on our beta version and to report issues, please refer to our documentation.

button-download.title: Download Symply
button-download.tooltip: You must confirm that you have read the information above in order to download Symply.

card.title: Warning
card.description: If you encounter issues on your Minecraft servers, please note that we are in a testing phase and cannot guarantee the resolution of all issues. However, we are here to assist you, so feel free to join our Discord server if you need assistance.

check.no: I have read carefully everything necessary to stay informed
